title.native: 神無き世界のカミサマ活動
title.english: KamiKatsu: Working for God in a Godless World

description:
As heir to a cult leader, Yukito centers his life around the mysterious goddess Mitama. But everything changes after he’s killed during a ritual gone wrong. To his surprise, Yukito is reborn into a world with no concept of god! And in this world, life and death are decided by the Imperial State. As Yukito fights to protect his new village, someone from his past life lends a helping hand.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: What God Does in a World Without Gods
KamiKatsu: Atividades Divinas em um Mundo sem Deuses
KamiKatsu: Meine Arbeit als Missionar in einer gottlosen Welt
โลกนี้ โลกหน้า ข้าก็เป็นพระเจ้า
KamiKatsu: Как быть богу в мире без богов?

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Cult
tags.description: Features a social group with unorthodox religious, spiritual, or philosophical beliefs and practices.

tags.name: Religion
tags.description: Centers on the belief that humanity is related to supernatural, transcendental, and spiritual elements.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Lost Civilization
tags.description: Featuring a civilization with few ruins or records that exist in present day knowledge.

tags.name: Satire
tags.description: Prominently features the use of comedy or ridicule to expose and criticise social phenomena.

tags.name: Anachronism
tags.description: Prominently features elements that are out of place in the historical period the work takes place in, particularly modern elements in a historical setting.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Intelligent non-organic machines that work and react similarly to humans.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Mythology
tags.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Seinen
tags.description: Target demographic is adult males.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Agriculture
tags.description: Prominently features agriculture practices.

tags.name: Bondage
tags.description: Features BDSM, with or without the use of accessories.

tags.name: Bisexual
tags.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

tags.name: Kaiju
tags.description: Prominently features giant monsters.

tags.name: Handjob
tags.description: Features the stimulation of genitalia by another's hands.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Cyborg
tags.description: Prominently features a human character whose physiological functions are aided or enhanced by artificial means.

tags.name: Feet
tags.description: Features the sexual depiction or stimulation of a character's feet.

tags.name: Gyaru
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who has a distinct American-emulated fashion style, such as tanned skin, bleached hair, and excessive makeup. Also known as gal.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Masochism
tags.description: Prominently features characters who get sexual pleasure from being hurt or controlled by others.

title.native: 神無き世界のカミサマ活動

name.native: エンリルタ・リースハイド・ベルトラン

node.description:
__Agency:__ StarRise

**[Website](https://kurusurin.jp/) | [Profile (Lantis)](https://lantis.jp/artist/kurusurin/) | [Profile (StarRise)](https://starrise.info/artists/kurusurin/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kurusurindesu) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ringring_rin/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@kurusu_rin)**

Japanese singer and voice actor, and former member/center of the idol group *26-Ji no Masquerade (26時のマスカレイド)*.

__Height:__ 153 cm
__Agency:__ Racoon Dog

[Profile (Racoon Dog)](https://www.raccoon-dog.co.jp/talent/r09-kitou.html
) | [Official Site](https://kitoakari.com/) | [Twitter (Official)](https://twitter.com/kitoakari_staff/) | [Twitter (Personal)](https://twitter.com/kitoakari_1016/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kitoakari_staff/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCU_E2DHcyQu-Toohyd1vzRw)

A Japanese voice actress. She debuted in 2014, got her first main role in *Time Bokan 24* (2016), and has since received more leading roles. On October 16, 2019, her 25th birthday, she made her debut as a solo music artist under Pony Canyon. After the agency Pro-Fit shut down their operations, she joined the new agency Racoon Dog on 2022. 

**Non anime roles:**
- [Abukuma](https://anilist.co/character/228251/Abukuma), Hass, Isuzu, and Nagara - Azur Lane (VG)
- [Barbara](https://anilist.co/character/203315/Barbara-Pegg) - Genshin Impact (VG)
- [Silence](https://anilist.co/character/186429/Silence) - Arknights (VG)
- Rola - Shadowverse (VG)
- Sabrina - Memento Mori (VG)
- Ashley Graham - Resident Evil 4 Remake (VG)
- Pepper - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- [Celine](https://anilist.co/character/305904 ) - Fire Emblem Engage (VG)

[Website (Hedworks)](http://hedworks.sakura.ne.jp/info.html) | [Twitter (Hedworks)](https://twitter.com/hed_works)

The president of Hedworks, a company that produces background art for anime and games.

_Note: Not to be confused with either of the two animators, [佐藤雅弘](https://anilist.co/staff/134126/) and [佐藤正博](https://anilist.co/staff/222513/)._
